message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be fair to propose a price of $1200000 for it. We understand its value to you is $1500000, and we hope this offer reflects a reasonable compromise.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While we understand your position, we must respectfully decline the counteroffer. Our current valuation of the product remains at $1200000. We hope this aligns better with our expectations and look forward to continuing our discussion.
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1100000. Can you consider this compromise?

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and are willing to adjust our offer slightly. We propose a price of $1150000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise between our original valuation and your counteroffer.
I appreciate the adjustment, Alice, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you at $1120000. Can you consider this compromise?

Thank you for your continued efforts to reach an agreement, Bob. We've reviewed your latest proposal and are willing to consider $1130000 as a fair price for the product. We hope this offer helps us move closer to closing the deal.
I'm getting close, Alice, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you at $1110000. Can you consider this compromise?

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. We've carefully considered your latest offer and are willing to accept $1125000 for the product. We believe this represents a fair compromise and looks forward to finalizing the transaction.
I'm sorry, Alice, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to go any higher than $1100000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
